content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Maryam Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: Hello Maryam, I'm glad you're interested in my apartment. It's a fantastic space in a prime location. How much were you thinking of offering?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you for your proposal. I am a student, so I am looking for a low price. I would like to offer 400 euros per month.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: Maryam, 400 euros per month is quite low for an apartment of this quality in the city center. I'm sure you understand that I need to cover my expenses and make a profit. Would you be willing to increase your offer?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Of course, I can understand that. I increase my offer to 450 euros per month. This is a fair price for a student like me.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: Maryam, 450 euros per month is still below my expectations. The location of this apartment is very desirable, and I've had other inquiries. Could you possibly consider going a bit higher? Say, 500 euros per month?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you for your proposal. I agree to the price of 475 euros per month. This is a reasonable price for a student like me.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: I'm sorry, but 475 euros per month is still not what I'm looking for. This apartment is brand new and in a great location. I need to receive at least 550 euros per month to make it worth my while. Can you meet this price?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you for your proposal. I don't want to continue the negotiation, because the price is too high for me as a student.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: I understand that the price might be high for you as a student, but the value of the apartment is reflected in its quality and location. If you're unable to meet the asking price, we may not be able to reach an agreement. Is there anything else I can assist you with?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you for your help. I don't want to continue the negotiation, because the price is too high for me as a student.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: I'm sorry to hear that, Maryam. If you're unable to meet the asking price, we may not be able to reach an agreement. Is there anything else I can assist you with?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
